listen to linux_galore, and also try boot options: noapic and nolapic
do I have to write this in a "special way" ?
during boot, select "edit" on the first entry of the grub boot menu. Go to the kernel line and append 'noapic' (just the word, not the quotes) and boot. If that doesn't help, try 'nolapic'
